name: Love, Time, Death, &... Dev? [DEMO]
description: A developer went into hours of making a game just for the fun of it. He then briefly realized how much work other Devs actually put into their work. Just so he doesn't have to go back into the game too often he loaded up the game to check for any errors that may or may not occur. But there was one. You, the player , become sentient the only thing is that you have no idea how or why.  Can you make it? or will you get a bad ending?
